title: Quarkus 3.1 rest client uses wrong Messagewriter
body:
### Describe the bug

We use https://github.com/cloudevents/sdk-java for sending cloud events with quarkus via a rest client. This worked fine for us until quarkus 3.1.
Using quarkus 3.1 a different Message writer is used than using quarkus 3.0.x.

With quarkus 3.1 io.cloudevents.http.restful.ws.impl.RestfulWSClientMessageWriter which fails.
With quarkus 3.0 io.cloudevents.http.restful.ws.impl.RestfulWSMessageWriter which works.

You can find them here https://github.com/cloudevents/sdk-java/tree/main/http/restful-ws/src/main/java/io/cloudevents/http/restful/ws/impl. We are using version 2.5.0 (The jakarta version is automatically created based on them)

Why is the other writer used in quarkus 3.1? Can this be changed somehow?

### Expected behavior

Either using the old Messagewriter or no exception.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

[code-with-quarkus-cloudevents.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11615323/code-with-quarkus-cloudevents.zip)

A test is included with quarkus 3.1 it fails, with quarkus 3.0.x it works.
